mapper.sql: column_name, dic_value, table_name, dic_name, dic_mark, dic_state, create_no, create_date
mapper.insert: insert into sy_normal_dics (column_name, dic_value, table_name, dic_name, dic_mark, dic_state, create_no, create_date) values (#{columnName,jdbcType=VARCHAR}, #{dicValue,jdbcType=INTEGER}, #{tableName,jdbcType=VARCHAR}, #{dicName,jdbcType=VARCHAR}, #{dicMark,jdbcType=VARCHAR}, #{dicState,jdbcType=CHAR}, #{createNo,jdbcType=INTEGER}, #{createDate,jdbcType=TIMESTAMP})

insert into sy_normal_dics
column_name,
dic_value,
table_name,
dic_name,
dic_mark,
dic_state,
create_no,
create_date,
#{columnName,jdbcType=VARCHAR},
#{dicValue,jdbcType=INTEGER},
#{tableName,jdbcType=VARCHAR},
#{dicName,jdbcType=VARCHAR},
#{dicMark,jdbcType=VARCHAR},

mapper.select: select distinct(column_name) from sy_normal_dics where table_name = #{tableName,jdbcType=VARCHAR}
select dic_value, dic_name from sy_normal_dics where table_name = #{tableName,jdbcType=VARCHAR} and column_name = #{columnName,jdbcType=VARCHAR} order by dic_value asc
